en: Narrator: Peppa and George are having their favourite food—spaghetti.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治正在吃他们最喜欢的食物——意大利面。

en: Daddy Pig: What a lot of noise.
cn: 猪爸爸：多么吵闹啊。

en: Peppa Pig: Finished!
cn: 小猪佩奇：吃完啦！

en: Mummy Pig: Now we’ll have a bit of quiet.
cn: 猪妈妈：现在可以安静一会儿了。

en: Peppa Pig: What’s that?
cn: 小猪佩奇：那是什么？

en: Daddy Pig: It’s a tooth.
cn: 猪爸爸：是一颗牙齿。

en: Peppa Pig: Where did that come from?
cn: 小猪佩奇：它从哪来的？

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, maybe you should look in the mirror.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，你要不要照照镜子？

en: Peppa Pig: Oh. It’s my tooth. It’s fallen out.
cn: 小猪佩奇：哦，是我的牙齿掉了。

en: Mummy Pig: Don’t worry, Peppa. It’s just a milk tooth. They’re meant to fall out.
cn: 猪妈妈：别担心，佩奇，那只是乳牙，本来就会掉的。

en: Peppa Pig: Will I grow a new one, Mummy?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我还会长新牙吗？

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, you will, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：会的，佩奇。

en: Mummy Pig: It also means the tooth fairy will be paying you a visit.
cn: 猪妈妈：这也意味着牙仙子会来找你。

en: Peppa Pig: Tooth fairy?
cn: 小猪佩奇：牙仙子？

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, the tooth fairy. If you put the tooth under your pillow tonight, the tooth fairy will come.
cn: 猪妈妈：对，牙仙子。你今晚把牙齿放在枕头下，牙仙子就会来。

en: Mummy Pig: The tooth fairy will take the tooth and in its place she will leave a shiny coin.
cn: 猪妈妈：牙仙子会拿走牙齿，留下一枚亮闪闪的硬币。

en: Peppa Pig: When I grow up I want to be a tooth fairy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我长大后想当牙仙子。

en: Daddy Pig: And what would you like to be when you grow up, George?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你长大后想做什么？

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Daddy Pig: A dinosaur.
cn: 猪爸爸：恐龙。

en: Peppa Pig: Quick, George. It’s bedtime. We don’t want to miss the tooth fairy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：快点，乔治。该睡觉了，别错过牙仙子。

en: Narrator: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
cn: 旁白：睡觉前，佩奇和乔治刷牙。

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa, what are you doing?
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇，你在干什么？

en: Peppa Pig: I’m brushing my tooth so it’s nice and clean for the tooth fairy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我要把牙齿刷干净，给牙仙子看。

en: Narrator: Peppa cannot wait to get into bed.
cn: 旁白：佩奇迫不及待想上床。

en: Narrator: Peppa is putting her tooth under the pillow for the tooth fairy.
cn: 旁白：佩奇把牙齿放在枕头下，等牙仙子。

en: Mummy Pig: Good-night, Peppa and George.
cn: 猪妈妈：晚安，佩奇，晚安，乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: Good-night, Mummy. Good-night, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：晚安，妈妈。晚安，爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Good-night, my little piggies.
cn: 猪爸爸：晚安，我的小猪们。

en: Peppa Pig: George, I’m not going to sleep. Let’s both stay awake all night and see the tooth fairy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，我不睡觉，我们一起等牙仙子。

en: Peppa Pig: This tooth fairy is very late.
cn: 小猪佩奇：牙仙子怎么还不来。

en: Narrator: The tooth fairy is taking a long time to arrive.
cn: 旁白：牙仙子很久都没来。

en: Peppa Pig: Where is that tooth fairy?
cn: 小猪佩奇：牙仙子去哪了？

en: Narrator: What is that noise? Is it the tooth fairy?
cn: 旁白：那是什么声音？是牙仙子吗？

en: Peppa Pig: George? Can you hear something? Oh, George.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，你听到什么了吗？哦，乔治。

en: Narrator: Oh, the noise is George. He was so tired he has fallen asleep.
cn: 旁白：原来是乔治太累睡着了。

en: Peppa Pig: George is not very good at staying awake. But I am. I’m going to stay awake and see the tooth fairy. I’m not going to sleep.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治不擅长熬夜，但我可以。我一定要等到牙仙子，不睡觉。

en: Narrator: The tooth fairy has arrived. Peppa is asleep.
cn: 旁白：牙仙子来了，佩奇却睡着了。

en: Tooth Fairy: Hello, Peppa. Would you like this coin in return for your tooth?
cn: 牙仙子：你好，佩奇。你愿意用牙齿换这枚硬币吗？

en: Tooth Fairy: What a nice clean tooth. Thank you, Peppa. Good-night.
cn: 牙仙子：多干净的牙齿，谢谢你，佩奇。晚安。

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, George, wake up. It’s morning.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，乔治，起床啦，天亮了。

en: Peppa Pig: What? I wasn’t asleep.
cn: 小猪佩奇：什么？我没睡着。

en: Daddy Pig: Did the tooth fairy come?
cn: 猪爸爸：牙仙子来了吗？

en: Peppa Pig: No.
cn: 小猪佩奇：没有。

en: Daddy Pig: Let’s take a look under your pillow.
cn: 猪爸爸：我们看看枕头下。

en: Mummy Pig: Look, Peppa. The tooth fairy has been and she’s left you a coin.
cn: 猪妈妈：看，佩奇，牙仙子来过，给你留了硬币。

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 小猪佩奇：万岁！

en: Mummy Pig: You fell asleep, didn’t you?
cn: 猪妈妈：你还是睡着了，对吧？

en: Peppa Pig: Well, maybe I fell asleep just for a little bit. Next time I will stay awake and I will see the tooth fairy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：也许我只睡了一小会儿。下次我一定要等到牙仙子。
